name: Workflow86
headline: AI Workflow Engineer for automating your business operations
description:
Workflow86 is your on-demand AI workflow engineer that designs, builds and edits complete end-to-end automated workflows and business processes based on your instructions. 

Workflow86 turns any description of a business process or procedure into an automated workflow with fully configured forms, tasks, integrations, notifications, document generation and more. Deploy highly customized business processes and workflows that work with your existing systems in minutes, and just as easily edit and iterate on them with no-code, code or AI assistance.

founders.name: Aaron Tran, Founder
founders.description: Founder of Workflow86, an AI-first workflow automation platform where AI handles the entire process of designing, building, and editing your internal business processes and operations.

## How it works
  1. #### Describe your workflow


![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/sPSKdT8SkixRRKBBXnRgF5WdT8.svg)
Describe a process or workflow you want to automate. You can even upload an image of a flow or process diagram. The AI will ask additional questions if it needs more information from you.
  1. #### AI builds your workflow


![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/2VkAo6ljhH14og637dPBl42j1c.png)
Workflow86 AI will analyze the requirements, develops a plan and then build the entire workflow including configuring every single step, action and component. 
  1. #### Edit manually or with AI


![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/o7HB40ZtV9UQiTI0ZtihHp02NzI.png)
You can manually edit the workflow at any time or ask the AI to edit any individual step or the entire workflow at once. Just describe the changes, updates or improvements.

#### All-in-one platform for complex workflows
With built-in forms, tables, tasks, code, AI and more, Workflow86 allows you to handle more complex, mission-critical workflows in one place while still connecting with your existing systems and apps when needed. 
[Explore all features](https://www.workflow86.com/<https:/app.workflow86.com/>)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/NlYZG2UtNTWp5YbBSFf4LXue4I.jpg)
#### Customize workflows from your existing systems
Workflow86 is a flexible customization layer that works with your existing systems. Whether it's your ERP, HRIS or CRM - build and deploy highly customized workflows that fit how your business operates without the weeks or months of implementation.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/eEPDBbz6uNeKTEqbplPlUmdTHs.svg)
#### Build without the learning curve with no-code + AI
Workflow86 combines an easy-to-use visual interface with drag and drop components supercharged with AI that help you build or edit any stage. Move seamlessly between manual changes and AI changes at any time with full version control for peace of mind.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/fvAeViT9B0QXII2XmtcNOTp1HAM.svg)
#### Maximum flexibility with custom code
Custom code modules allow you to write and run Python and JavaScript with access to select external libraries and the ability to securely make requests to external services. Deploy custom code to handle edge cases, assisted with AI to help write or edit this code if required. 
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/JIjYCIrGR0l72NhabzNCQpgrOEo.svg)
#### Deploy AI in your workflows
AI workflow components allow you to handle off tasks to AI to summarize information, generate content, make decisions, evaluate data and more.
‚ú® AI Workflow Builder
## Automate in minutes with our AI workflow builder
Our AI Workflow Builder designs, plans and builds fully configured workflows using just natural language. Once a workflow has been created, it can continue to edit, change or completely redesign the entire workflow based on your instructions. Edit the entire workflow or edit specific components. 
[Learn more](https://www.workflow86.com/<https:/app.workflow86.com/>)

## Automate the most complex workflows with ease
Orchestrate and manage complex, multi-stage workflows with dozens or hundreds of steps with features that allow for full control over workflow execution.
Run actions in parallel
Merge action paths and branches back together
Split workflow into multiple paths

## Keep humans in the loop with tasks
Many business processes require a mixture of automation and human-in-the-loop steps. Workflow86 comes a built-in task manager which pauses a workflow until a task is completed, such as a review and approval or follow-on form is submitted.
Build tasks in an easy to use drag-and-drop form builder
Assign tasks to internal or external team members and stakeholders
Manage your tasks across workflows in a single Task Inbox

**Workflow86: Your AI Workflow Engineer for Business Automation**

**Overview:**
Founded in 2021 and a participant in Y Combinator's W22 batch, Workflow86 is based in Sydney, Australia, and is comprised of a nimble team of six. The company's mission is simple yet impactful: to serve as an AI Workflow Engineer, automating business operations seamlessly.

**What They Do:**
Workflow86 transforms any description of a business process into a fully automated, end-to-end workflow. This includes everything from forms and tasks to integrations and document generation. You essentially tell Workflow86 what you need, and it designs, builds, and also allows for easy edits to suit your organization‚Äôs unique operations‚Äîall without the need for extensive coding knowledge.

**Key Features:**
1. **AI-Powered Design**: Workflow86 uses natural language processing to generate workflows, making it intuitive to create complex automations.
2. **Flexibility**: The platform supports both no-code and custom code solutions, letting users tweak their workflows manually or leverage AI for modifications.
3. **Integration Ready**: With compatibility for existing systems (like ERPs or CRMs) and a variety of pre-built integrations, businesses can quickly deploy custom workflows that fit right into their existing tech stack.
4. **User-Friendly Interface**: A drag-and-drop interface ensures that even non-technical users can navigate and set up intricate workflows effortlessly.

**Applications:**
Workflow86 caters to multiple departments and use cases‚ÄîSales (lead management), Marketing (campaign scheduling), HR (onboarding processes), and more. This versatility means it can help nearly any organization streamline their operations.

**Customer Feedback:**
Clients laud Workflow86 for enabling them to automate critical processes effectively. Notably, a Chief Technology Officer from a large firm noted they automated over 15 key operations, filling significant system gaps. Another user highlighted the efficiency gained from launching a workflow that would typically take weeks of development time, accomplishing it in under a day.

**Conclusion:**
In today's fast-paced business landscape, Workflow86 positions itself as a potent ally for companies looking to enhance their operational efficiencies through automation. With its AI-driven capabilities and user-friendly platform, it‚Äôs making the complexities of process automation accessible for everyone. If you‚Äôre interested in a trial, they offer a 14-day free trial‚Äîno credit card needed.

Explore more at [Workflow86](https://www.workflow86.com) and start automating today!
